ComicInfo.Summary: Get a sneak peek at IDW’s newest Star Trek series with previews of Lower Decks, Picard: Stargazer, The Mirror War, Year Five, the Klingons one-shot, and the upcoming ongoing series!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 12:24:38. [CVDB955741]
ComicInfo.Writer: Collin Kelly, David Tipton, Jackson Lanzing, Kirsten Beyer, Mike Johnson, Ryan North, Scott Tipton
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ángel Hernández, Chris Fenoglio, Stephen Thompson, Timothy Green II
ComicInfo.Inker: Ángel Hernández, Chris Fenoglio, Stephen Thompson, Timothy Green II
ComicInfo.Colorist: Charlie Kirchoff, DC Alonso, JD Mettler, Lee Loughridge
ComicInfo.Letterer: Johanna Nattalie, Nathan Widick, Neil Uyetake
ComicInfo.Editor: Chase Marotz, Denton J. Tipton, Heather Antos, Megan Brown
ComicInfo.Characters: Admiral Chapman, Andy Billups, B'Elanna Torres, Beckett Mariner, Benjamin Sisko, Brad Boimler, Carol Freeman, Christopher Pike, D'Vana Tendi, Data, Deanna Troi, Ensign Casey , Gary Mitchell, Gary Seven, Hikaru Sulu, Hoshi Sato, Jack Ransom, James T. Kirk, Jean-Luc Picard, Jennifer sh'Reyan, Jonathan Archer, Kahless the Unforgettable, Kathryn Janeway, Lt.
